title: How to Create a MASSIVE Movement!
description: Today I share the SECRET STRATEGY ALL GREAT LEADERS USE to CREATE a MOVEMENT⁣ ⁣ Show me anything great in the world today and I’ll show you something being run by a leader! ⁣ ⁣ I don’t care if you’re leading a business, a church, a team or a family. Great leaders sell the DREAM and have an EVANGELIST mentality.⁣ ⁣ You must be able to SELL a FUTURE, VISION, and DREAM so BIG, that the dreams of everyone in your stewardship can see their dreams fitting inside the big one you’re selling!⁣ ⁣ Just like a preacher in a church, to become a GREAT LEADER and build a Movement, you must learn how to build a religious, cult-like following! ⁣ ⁣ (Yes, this is a good thing ) think STARBUCKS or APPLE! They have more than simply customers or clients, they have followers... it’s almost like a religion for some people (and NO I’m not equating the power of a company to the power or Importance of any particular religion, it is an analogy )⁣ ⁣ Whenever you see a movement that has a die-hard following, I guarantee you that MOVEMENT is lead by a leader who is a crusader for their CAUSE! They LIVE, BREATHE and BELIEVE in the dream!⁣ ⁣ In this episode, I’m teaching you the SECRET Pillars ALL great Leaders use to build a POWERFUL MOVEMENT in your business AND in every area of your life! This will help you succeed as a business leader, a leader in your family, in your faith, in your fitness… EVERYWHERE! ⁣ ⁣ This is again HIGHLY TACTICAL “HOW TO “INFORMATION. You will take a ton of notes.⁣ ⁣ YOU WERE PUT HERE ON EARTH TO DO SOMETHING GREAT! The TOOLS I’m sharing in this episode will give you the PRACTICAL skills you need to build a MOVEMENT around your purpose!⁣
author: edwardmylett@yahoo.com (Ed Mylett)
